response.job_title: Sales engineer Personal care and Pharma - Product leader for Fragance Industry at DISAN LATAM | Project management specialist
response.summary: Welcome, I am Sebastian, Chemical Engineer eager to acquire knowledge. Committed and applied. Experience in sales, technical advising and formulation for cosmetic, pharmacteutical and house hold industry. With strong sales, technical and communication skills. Looking forward for oportunities to best my knowledge and skills.
response.skills: Communication skills , Problem Solving , Customer focus, Thermodynamics , Engineering, Research, Analysis , Marketing, AutoCAD, English, Aspen Plus, Pharmaceutical QA methods, Aseguramiento de la calidad, Negociation skills, Análisis de datos

profile_positions.description:
Product leader - Fragance Industry:
• Set the sales strategy aiming to achieve the annual goals with a focus on the business growth.  
• Define the inventory management strategy. 
• Bring support to the sales team for key negotiations. 

Sales Engineer: 
2022 budget compliance of 150% for sales and over 190% for margin.
8% of 2022 sales given by won opportunities.  

• Maintain and generate new sales on existing accounts through different strategies such as proper use of the CRM and constant lookout for opportunities. 
• Meet the sales budget for the assigned accounts for all products on the catalog (Specialties and commodities). 
• Comply with individual and company goals. 
• Provide quotations, carry out negotiations and close deals within personal care and pharmaceutical industry.
• Keep the client’s portfolio up to date.
• Feed the sales forecast of products keeping mind on the company’s working capital.
profile_positions.title: Sales engineer Personal care and Pharma - Product leader fragance industry
Sales engineer - Personal care and pharmaceutical industries

profile_positions.description:
•	Provide sales and technical service for the assigned accounts.
•	Meet the opportunities budget (USD). 
•	Provide formulations including specialty raw materials.
•	Carry out cold sales in order to meet the new clients creation goal.
profile_positions.title: Technical advisor / Key account manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Perform quality analysis on company and third party samples through the use of several measurement equipment and specialized software
•	Handling of analytical equipment such as HPLC, atomic absorption, infrared spectroscopy, and other instrumental analytical techniques. 
•	Development of technical dossiers for expedition and renovation of sanitary registries.
profile_positions.title: Stability analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Carry out physicochemical analysis for finished, on process, on development products and raw materials for pharmaceutical, veterinary, agrochemical and cosmetic industries.
•	Chemical analysis method validation for finished, on process products and raw materials.
profile_positions.title: Quality Control Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Internship within the Scent & Care division in the company. 
• Development and production of fragrances in laboratory level, application of fragrances in product bases
profile_positions.title: Engineering Trainee

company.name: DISAN LATAM
company.description:
Cuando haces parte de nuestro equipo te das cuenta que hay una forma diferente de hacer las cosas bien. En DISAN actuamos de acuerdo con los valores y creencias que hacen parte de nuestra cultura corporativa y los practicamos a diario en nuestras relaciones con clientes, proveedores y compañeros de trabajo.

La integridad, la responsabilidad, el optimismo y el respeto son nuestros valores corporativos.
